casebody.data:
BERKHEIMER
v.
REKM, L.L.C. 2018-1199 Supreme Court of Ohio. September 12, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On motions for admission pro hac vice of Hugh S. Balsam, Andrea V. Kerstein, and Ashley M. Knuckey. Motions granted. Pursuant to Gov.Bar R. XII(4), counsel shall file a notice of permission with the Supreme Court's Office of Attorney Services within 30 days.
